scripts.generate-ts-client: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -i hack/openapi/openapi.json -g typescript-fetch -o packages/ts/src/client --additional-properties=typescriptThreePlus=true,supportsES6=true
scripts.generate-python-client: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -i hack/openapi/openapi.json -g python -o packages/python/daytona/gclient --additional-properties=packageName=daytonasdk,pythonVersion=3.9,library=urllib3,generateSourceCodeOnly=true,hideGenerationTimestamp=true
scripts.exec-command-example: npx dotenvx run -f .env.local -- npx ts-node examples/ts/exec-command/src/
